name: surat-itms
description: Surat transit management datasource is a rich and comprehensive GTFS based data stream of public transit operations in the city.  In this sandbox we show analysis on stop-to-stop coverage, temporal and spatial schedule-to-live conformance and show some intuitive and interactive plots to give a wholistic understanding on transit management systems.
label: Surat Transit Management System

referenceResources.name: Static Transit Management data
referenceResources.description: GTFS based static information of buses such as stops, routes, etc.

referenceResources.name: Realtime Transit Management data
referenceResources.description: Real time bus positions and daily trip schedules
